channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP -- BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform (Promotion Management)

item.title: CVE-2023-28765|2024-08-02T13:51:37.306Z -- sap -- businessobjects%20business%20intelligence%20platform%20%28promotion%20management%29
item.description: An attacker with basic privileges in SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform (Promotion Management) - versions 420, 430, can get access to lcmbiar file and further decrypt the file. After this attacker can gain access to BI userâ€™s passwords and depending on the privileges of the BI user, the attacker can perform operations that can completely compromise the application.
